column1: On March 20th, there are numerous roadworks and incidents reported across Singapore's major expressways and roads. On the Tampines Expressway (TPE), roadworks are taking place towards the Pan Island Expressway (PIE) after Loyang Avenue Exit, towards the Seletar Expressway (SLE) at Tampines Avenue 7 Entrance, and before Jalan Kayu Exit. On the PIE, roadworks are reported towards Changi Airport after Jurong West Avenue 2, before Jalan Bahar, after Toh Guan Road
